title: sigh you know someone is guilty of hacking when...
body: you call them out for it in a game and they are on your team next game int loosing the game just to spite you. called being guilty and you just admitted you were hacking. trying to prove you are not is the same as admitting you are.

replies.body: what did you just say even

Except.. you cant actually hack league? Or any well-made modern online game?

Also that logic makes absolutely no sense.
Literally EVERY online game modern or not has some way of cheating. League scripting is in the same vein of auto aim in shooters and I'm guessing that's what he's referring to.
